::DrillBit::

He kept up with KitKat.

::Hot Rod::

He heard Zardus' message.
"Finally a cance to slag someone." He ran to the exit, besides Zardus.
He saw Feline, going after Rage.
He aimed, ready to back her up.

::Dimolition::

He followed his fellow War Machines out, of the ship.
"I checked the maps before we crashed. We are near a base, of bots who
have bannded together.(The Alliance base.) We should head there." He
said, to Havoc.
